name: Attack and Dethrone Dog
description:
A game about a young hero who has, through whatever series of events, set out to fight Dog Himself.

Controls

WASD/arrow keys - move
Space/Enter - attack, restart game
Shift  - dodge

Credits

  • Art
    • Kenney (https://kenney.itch.io/kenney-game-assets-1)
    •  Beowulf (https://beowulf.itch.io/rpg-boss-monsters-minions-huge-pack)

  • Font
    • somepx (https://somepx.itch.io/humble-fonts-gold)
